about_the_game:
Croak & GO!

Cute, bite-sized precision top down 2D platformer where a speed-obsessed hungry frog races clocks. Shave time off runs with challenging unlocks based on speed and/or jump counts across all levels! 

CORE:

🐸 Beat Challenges based on number of Jumps or Complete Time.

⏱️ Brutal Times – Challenging unlocks, find the most optimal route for Speed OR for Jumps. 

🔌 Power-Up Economy – Temporary boosts invites extra strategy to your level runs.

🕹️ Retro-Infused – A calling to Amiga games of the 1990's.

FOR:

  • Speedrunners.

  • Arcade Style Challenge!

  • Completionists.

  • Pickup and Play. 

"Hop fast or croak faster!"

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS / Linux
  • Processor: 86x 64x
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Additional Notes: Linux Builds tested on SteamOS (SteamDeck)

name: Psycho Frogo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 86x / 64x CPU
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct X: Version 10
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Croak & GO!Cute, Bite-Sized Precision 2D platformer where a speed-obsessed hungry frog races clocks. Shave time off runs, and unlock levels on certain requirements. Developed by Solo Indie Dev.
